programme.title: Siilipoiss Alfredi salapärased seiklused
programme.desc: Alfred, Camille ja Milo plaanivad kalalkäiku, kuid härra Remy rikub nende plaanid.(n)

programme.title: Tinka jõulumuinaslugu
programme.desc: Tinkal ja Lassel läheb korda Storm Üksilduse Torni meelitada, ent selgub, et seal nende otsingud ei lõpe, vaid alles algavad.(n)

programme.title: Suur muutus
Velikoje zakrõtie
programme.desc: Kümneosalise nukufilmi lustakas lugu nelja sõbra - jutuka Pärdiku, tagasihoidliku Elevandipoja, ekstsentrilise Papagoi ja mõtliku Boa ettevõtmistest koduses džunglis, kus tihtilugu tuleb lahendada naljakaid paradokse, mis on seotud mitmetähenduslike sõnamängudega.(n)

programme.title: Peeter Paani uued seiklused
programme.desc: Peeter ja Kadunud Lapsed püüavad teha kõik, et kingitused rikkiläinud soovimasinale vaatamata kõigi lasteni jõuaksid. Selgub, et jõulude õnnestumiseks on vajalik vanade vaenlaste vaherahu.(n)

programme.title: Restoran 0
programme.desc: Restoran 0 avab viimaks oma uksed. Avamispäev on palavikuline toimetamine nii kokkadele kui ka disainitiimile, kes leiab end ühtäkki teenindajate rollis. Midagi pole teha: rahvale on lubatud uksed avada ja saab kõik valmis või ei saa, lauad kaetakse ning hullumeelne idee ehitada nädalaga restoran saabki teoks! Saatejuhid Ott Tomik, Märt Metsallik ja Hannes Praks. Režissöör Mikk Jürjens, produtsent Eero Reinu.(n)

programme.title: Astrospioonid
AstroSpies
programme.desc: Paljud mäletavad kosmoserakettide starte ning USA ja NSV Liidu võistlust 1960-ndatel esimesena Kuule jõudmise nimel. Vähesed aga teavad suurriikide salajastest kosmoseluureprogrammidest ja veel vähem teatakse sellest, mis on saanud välja õpetatud militaarastronautidest, kelle ülisalajased missioonid võinuks pisimagi eksimuse korral valla päästa sõja orbiidil.(n)

programme.title: Metslased
programme.desc: Metslased on jõudnud kitsarööpmelise raudteetammi kõrval asuvasse Rootsi pooljaama, millele on uue hingamise andnud kaks skulptorit - Maigi ja Rene. Läheme tagasi eelmise sajandi karmi aega ja liigume ajaloolase Martin Andrelleriga Põrgupõhja metsavenna punkri sees ning ümber. Telk, mis ripub õhus. Saame vastuse küsimusele, kuidas kasepuust saab kilekotte teha. Lisaks loodustarkusi ja palju muud. Operaatorid Manuel Mägi ja Lemo, sarja autor Lemo, tootja Tootmisguru OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Filmiklubi
programme.desc: Filmi "Karate Kid" juhatab sisse R2 ajakirjanik Margus Kamlat.(n)

programme.title: Karate Kid
programme.desc: R: John G. Avildsen. O: Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita. Daniel (Macchio) on nohiklik noor mees, kes saabub idarannikult LA-sse ja ei leia siin endale uusi sõpru. Kui poiss asub looma suhteid kohaliku gängiliidri endise tüdruksõbraga, asub jõuk teda taga kiusama. Daniel peab paluma abi majateenijalt ja kunagiselt võitluskunstide meistrilt Miyagilt (Morita), et too talle karated õpetaks. Pärast pikka veenmist nõustubki mees noorukit õpetama, kuid teeb seda omapärasel viisil.(n)

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their little daughter, a doll- maker and his wife welcome a nun and a group of orphaned girls to their home, but somehow they become the target of the doll-maker's demonic creation, Annabelle.

programme.title: Terminal
programme.desc: Set in a train terminal at night, two assassins with a sinister mission, a fatally ill teacher, an enigmatic janitor, and a waitress with a double life meet. Murderous consequences unravel as their lives intersect at the hands of a criminal mastermind hell-bent on revenge.

programme.title: A Simple Favor
programme.desc: Stephanie, a mother who works as a blogger, seeks to discover the mystery of the disappearance of her friend Emily from the city by joining her friend's husband, where everyone is subjected to love and loyalty tests and secrets that could cause murder and revenge.

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: An employee at an one hour photo lab becomes obsessed with a certain family and chases them everywhere. The family discovers that he's mentally ill with aggressive tendencies, posing a grave risk to their lives.

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: After the trials and tribulations faced by our heroes in the Age of Ultron, a new kind of challenge arises: Government agencies aim to control the Avengers' every decision and action. This time, Captain America stands on one side of the fence, and Iron Man , on the other side.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: Danny and his team are pulled back to do another impossible heist to return the money they stole from Las Vegas casino tycoon, Terry Benedict.

programme.title: The Big Sick
programme.desc: After performing one of his stand-up shows,Pakistani-born comedian Kumail Nanjiani meets grad student Emily Gardner. Their relationship develops into true love but they have to face many challenges.

programme.title: Project Almanac
programme.desc: A group of high school teenagers find a way to build a time machine, and go back in time to fix their past mistakes in life, but soon they discover that messing with their past has catastrophic consequences on the future.

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: Armed with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, master thief Scott Lang must embrace his inner-hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, protect the secret behind his spectacular Ant-Man suit from a new generation of towering threats.

programme.title: The Avengers
programme.desc: Nick Fury is director of S.H.I.E.L.D, an international peace keeping agency. The agency is a who's who of Marvel Super Heroes, with Iron Man, The Incredible Hulk, Thor, Captain America, Hawkeye and Black Widow. When global security is threatened by Loki and his cohorts, Nick Fury and his team will need all their powers to save the world from disaster.

programme.title: Shazam
programme.desc: The life of the foster child Billy Batson changes forever after the ancient wizard Shazam grants him the power to transform into an adult superhero, only to find himself chased by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana who is after his newfound powers.

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: Today, Kaulder is the last witch hunter remaining, and has spent centuries hunting down rogue witches, all the while yearning for his long-lost loved ones. However, unbeknownst to Kaulder, the Queen Witch is resurrected and seeks revenge on her killer causing an epic battle that will determine the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Friends With Benefits
programme.desc: Dylan and Jamie are close friends who discover that sleeping together doesn't complicate their relationship, and decide to challenge the stereotype.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their little daughter, a doll- maker and his wife welcome a nun and a group of orphaned girls to their home, but somehow they become the target of the doll-maker's demonic creation, Annabelle.

programme.title: Blended
programme.desc: After their blind date goes horribly bad, Jim and Lauren decide they should never see each other again, until they get stuck with their respective kids at a family resort.(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: Armed with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, master thief Scott Lang must embrace his inner-hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, protect the secret behind his spectacular Ant-Man suit from a new generation of towering threats.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean is training his gang to prepare for a third robbery, after the casino owner Willie Bank betrays their friend Reuben Tishkoff.(n)

programme.title: Shazam
programme.desc: The life of the foster child Billy Batson changes forever after the ancient wizard Shazam grants him the power to transform into an adult superhero, only to find himself chased by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana who is after his newfound powers.(n)

programme.title: Platoon
programme.desc: Young Chris decides to enlist in the Vietnam war, but finds out that he doesn't belong there. He goes through a psychological struggle as he faces battle between the enemy and within his platoon.(n)

programme.title: Home of the Brave
programme.desc: Four vets struggle to adjust to civilian life after they return from a tour in Iraq. Haunted by what they have seen and what they have done, their psychological scars might be even harder to heal than their physical ones.(n)

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Evacuation of Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire, Canada, and France, who were cut off and surrounded by the German army from the beaches and harbor of Dunkirk, France, between May 27- June 04, 1940, during Battle of France in World War II.(n)

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: The true story of legendary cryptanalyst Alan Turing who along with his brilliant team of code-breakers at Britain's top-secret Government Code and Cypher School attempt to crack the German Enigma code during World War II.(n)

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: In the wake of a wrongful murder conviction, Henry is sent to a remote penitentiary colony. Once there, he soon comes to bond with another inmate, Louis Dega. Together, they plan for their escape.(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Young girl Riley moves to San Francisco with her dad for his new job. She's guided by her emotions - Joy, Anger, Disgust, Fear and Sadness - who live in the “Headquarters” of her mind. Joy, Riley’s most important emotion, is constantly clashing with the others to keep Riley's outlook positive.(n)

programme.title: The Avengers
programme.desc: Nick Fury is director of S.H.I.E.L.D, an international peace keeping agency. The agency is a who's who of Marvel Super Heroes, with Iron Man, The Incredible Hulk, Thor, Captain America, Hawkeye and Black Widow. When global security is threatened by Loki and his cohorts, Nick Fury and his team will need all their powers to save the world from disaster.(n)

programme.desc: A group of high school teenagers find a way to build a time machine, and go back in time to fix their past mistakes in life, but soon they discover that messing with their past has catastrophic consequences on the future.(n)

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: In the wake of a wrongful murder conviction, Henry is sent to a remote penitentiary colony. Once there, he soon comes to bond with another inmate, Louis Dega. Together, they plan for their escape.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's 8
programme.desc: Debbie, Danny Ocean's sister, attempts to pull off the heist of the century at New York City's star-studded annual Met Gala. Her first stop is to assemble the perfect all-female crew: Lou, Rose, Daphne Kluger, Nine Ball, Tammy, Amita, and Constance.(n)

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: The true story of legendary cryptanalyst Alan Turing who along with his brilliant team of code-breakers at Britain's top-secret Government Code and Cypher School attempt to crack the German Enigma code during World War II.(n)

programme.title: Zookeeper
programme.desc: When the zookeeper decides to quit winning back his ex-girlfriend, the animals try to teach him the ways of love.(n)

programme.title: Moana
programme.desc: Moana is the enthusiastic daughter of the commander of the navigators. As she sails on a mission to save her people, she meets the once-powerful demigod Maui who helps her through her quest to set things right and find the true essence of who she is.(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: Four years after the Jurassic World theme park was closed down and the eruption of a dormant volcano on the island, Owen (Chris Pratt) and Claire (Bryce Dallas Howard) return to Isla Nubar to save the dinosaurs before they extinguish.(n)

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: An apocalyptic, endless winter forces humanity to take cover and try to survive in a number of underground outposts. When Colony 7 receives a distress call from a nearby settlement, they must face not only a dangerous rescue mission but a chilling discovery that could end their existence.(n)

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: United Nations employee, Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt), must leave his family and traverse the world in a race against time to stop a Zombie pandemic that is crumbling armies and governments in its wake.(n)

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: The true story of legendary cryptanalyst Alan Turing who along with his brilliant team of code-breakers at Britain's top-secret Government Code and Cypher School attempt to crack the German Enigma code during World War II.(n)

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Evacuation of Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire, Canada, and France, who were cut off and surrounded by the German army from the beaches and harbor of Dunkirk, France, between May 27- June 04, 1940, during Battle of France in World War II.(n)

programme.title: Platoon
programme.desc: Young Chris decides to enlist in the Vietnam war, but finds out that he doesn't belong there. He goes through a psychological struggle as he faces battle between the enemy and within his platoon.(n)

programme.title: Obvious Child
programme.desc: After she breaks up with her boyfriend, Donna, a stand-up comic, has a one-night stand with Max which results in a pregnancy, whereupon Donna is left with no choice but to start behaving like an adult and face the consequences of her actions.

programme.title: Eat Pray Love
programme.desc: Liz who failed in her marriage, decides to find herself a new life with a new spirit, she travels around the world, in order to find peace and balance in her life.

programme.title: Third Person
programme.desc: Across three cities, three couples struggle through various life hurdles, fighting their way through personal and professional challenges as they connect through one common denominator: love.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: June Havens meets Secret Agent Miller, at the airport by accident. She gets involved with him in a secret operation to protect an energy source that holds the key to infinite power. Things get more complicated when Miller's enemies tell June that Miller suffers from a nervous breakdown.

programme.title: Overdrive
programme.desc: When their newest job lands them in trouble with a local crime lord, two car thieves find that their only way out of their predicament is for them to agree to steal the prized car of the crime lord's rival.

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: Two cops partner up in order to uncover how a group of bank robbers managed to escape from a bank during a heist that apparently has other motives than just stealing money.

programme.title: Midnight Sun
programme.desc: Katie, an attractive 17-year-old girl who has a health issue has been confined to her house during the day by a rare disease that makes even the smallest amount of sunlight deadly. Fate intervenes when she meets Charlie and they embark on a summer romance.

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: A chance meeting between William, a bookstore owner, and Anna Scott, the world-famous actress, sparks a love story after Anna enlists his help to hide from a tabloid scandal. But falling for the world's most desired woman is not easy, neither is the public scrutiny that comes with it.

programme.title: Home Again
programme.desc: When Alice gets divorced, she takes her children and moves to LA. There she meets three young and ambitious actors who are looking for a place to stay, which eventually turns into an unexpected turn of events.

programme.title: Stuck in Love
programme.desc: An acclaimed writer struggles with getting over his ex-wife, and raising his teenaged children, as they all try to grapple with the complicated thing called love.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: “The FootLoose” is a recreation of the original movie in 1984, which narrates the story of a young boy “Rayan” who comes back to his village after a long departure, only to find that singing and dancing are no more allowed, because of the tragic death of five teenagers some years ago. Although Rayan falls in love with Ariel, who similarly adores singing and dancing, yet he is shocked again once more when he realizes that her father -the priest- is one of the strongest supporters of the anti singing and dancing decision. Hence the young couple determines to rebel and encourage everyone else to do the same.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: The story of a super-secret spy organization that recruits an unrefined but promising street kid, Harry, into the agency's ultra-competitive training program. Harry's father died when he was a child during an operation with this same organization. A global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius only to be confronted by the new recruit.

programme.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
programme.desc: When the best bodyguard in the world is appointed to protect a notorious hit-man to bring him to court, they both have to put their ego aside to reach court on time.

programme.title: Overdrive
programme.desc: When their newest job lands them in trouble with a local crime lord, two car thieves find that their only way out of their predicament is for them to agree to steal the prized car of the crime lord's rival.

programme.title: Home Again
programme.desc: When Alice gets divorced, she takes her children and moves to LA. There she meets three young and ambitious actors who are looking for a place to stay, which eventually turns into an unexpected turn of events.

programme.title: Thick as Thieves
programme.desc: The story of two professional thieves who must steal a museum packed with jewelry in order to pay their debt to the Russian mob, and one of them recruits another thief to successfully complete the robbery.

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: A reckoning arrives for a police officer known for his ghastly ideals and hateful ways, as he is caught on tape brutally beating a guy. As his police department faces heat for letting him run amok, he struggles to tell friend from foe as he tries to defend his "right" to hate indiscriminately.

programme.title: Parker
programme.desc: Parker is a thief with a moral code. When he is deceived by four guys after a heist and left for dead, he becomes determined to get back at them. Taking on a new identity to infiltrate their gang, he enlists the help of a woman on the inside.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: A DEA agent (Denzel Washington) and a naval intelligence officer (Mark Wahlberg) find themselves on the run after a botched attempt to infiltrate a drug cartel. While fleeing, they learn the secret of their shaky alliance: Neither knew that the other was an undercover agent.(n)

programme.title: American Animals
programme.desc: Based on a true story, four young men attempt one of the most audacious heists in U.S. history by trying to steal a collection of rare books from the private collection at the University of Transylvania, but they discover that the plan has taken a different course from what they had planned.(n)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: With the Kingsman agents adrift after the destruction of their headquarters, they find an ally in an American organization that resembles their own. The agents of both organizations rally and combine their expertise to take down a common enemy that poses a threat to the entire world.(n)

programme.title: Stuck in Love

programme.desc: All hell breaks loose after Brooke breaks up with her immature boyfriend Gary, as neither of them wants to move out of the apartment.(n)

programme.title: Labor Pains
programme.desc: In an attempt to keep her job, Thea lies about being pregnant, but things get out of hand as she starts receiving special treatment and decides to keep up the act.(n)

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: Married couple Phil and Claire live a routine life, but all this changes when they decide to do something new, so they go to the city to get into a new restaurant and use different names to have seats of another couple, which gets them caught up in a gang war that completely changes their lifestyle.(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Alice, Robin, Lucy, Meg, Tom and David live in New York, a city full of lonely wandering hearts. One purpose brings all of them together: the need to learn to sustain being single in a time when our definition of love is constantly changing.(n)

programme.desc: After four ninja turtles are mutated by a mysterious alien substance, they must come out of the sewers to defend their city against forces of evil from both past and present.

programme.desc: SpongeBob returns for more underwater adventures, driven along by his curiosity and his attempt to discover everything new in his world.(n)

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: The L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team (S.W.A.T.) is charged with securing and escorting criminal Alex Montell, who is a foreign mafia leader wanted by the Interpol. Alex is offering a $ 100 million reward for anyone who can break him out of police custody.

programme.title: Automation
programme.desc: When AUTO, a workspace robot, finds out that another advanced model will be taking his place, his fear of destruction drives him to a devastating rampage as he tries to protect his existence, leaving the factory workers scrambling to find safety and put an end to the killing spree.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Cop Brian O'Conner is assigned with stopping a group of car-hijackers led by Dominic Toretto. However, he gets enamored with the street-racing society, and he has to decide where does his loyalty lie.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
programme.desc: As he attempts to rescue Princess Leia from Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker teams up with Han Solo and two droids to find the princess and destroy a powerful weapon made by the Galactic Empire.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: The Decepticons' leader is looking for a miraculous super stone that gives its holder supernatural strength. The only one able to get to the stone is Sam, a college student, and his friend Mikaela. Will he be able to save the world before the stone falls into the hands of the Decepticons.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: After Mr. X steals DM85, a deadly biological weapon, and its antidote, he arranges to sell it to billionaire, Liam Wonder. During their meeting, extreme sports player, Zhao Feng, accidentally parachutes into Bruce and the four rookies room and gets involved with them.

programme.title: Automation
programme.desc: When AUTO, a workspace robot, finds out that another advanced model will be taking his place, his fear of destruction drives him to a devastating rampage as he tries to protect his existence, leaving the factory workers scrambling to find safety and put an end to the killing spree.

programme.title: Thor: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe, where he finds himself racing against time to stop Ragnarök and the almighty Hela, who threatens to demolish his home Asgard.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Sam's intention to leave the Autobots behind in pursuit of a normal life is thwarted as an old Decepticon known as The Fallen rises, forcing Sam and his girlfriend Mikaela to delve into the history of the Transformers on Earth to find a way to defeat The Fallen.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.

programme.title: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters
programme.desc: Putting a twist on the old fairytale, "Hansel & Gretel" brings us the siblings as grown up bounty hunters who track and kill witches all over the world. As the Blood Moon approaches, the pair encounter a new evil that might hold a secret to their past.

programme.title: Alexander
programme.desc: The true story of Alexander the Great's conquests and the unprecedented military feat of conquering 90% of the known world by the age of 27, as well as his relationship with his childhood friend Hephaistionand his wife Roxane.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: During the time of the Roman empire, Emperor Marcus Aurelius decides that his heir will be General Maximus. However, his son, Commodus, murders him before he has a chance to act on his decision, and he becomes the Emperor after his father. Commodus then decides that Maximus must be killed, who in a turn of events, becomes a gladiator and a hero in people's eyes.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy 2
programme.desc: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 continues the team's adventures as they traverse the outer reaches of the cosmos. The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill's true parentage. Old foes become new allies and favorite characters from the classic comics will come to the Guardians' aid as the Marvel cinematic universe continues to expand.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: The film revolves around the arrival of seven armed men, from the Old West to a remote village, in order to help its people, in their fight against an evil gang trying take advantage of the village and the people.

programme.title: Father of the Bride
programme.desc: George (Steve Martin) and Nina (Diane Keaton) are the parents of the soon-to-be-wed daughter Annie (Kimberly Williams-Paisley). George isn't yet able to accept the idea that he will let his daughter go, while a series of comic events take place during the preparation for the wedding.

programme.title: Larry Crowne
programme.desc: Middle-aged Larry Crown loses his job, and decides that he wants to start over and go back to college. He meets Mercedes, his professor, who leads a disappointing life with her husband. Fate brings them together, and Larry finally begins to fall in love with life again.

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: Chuck works at a large courier company, and is in love with his girlfriend, Kelly. He plans to propose to her on Christmas, but is required to go to Malaysia for an urgent work assignment. The plane he's on crashes on the way, leaving Chuck as the only survivor on a deserted island, where it is up to him to protect both his own body and his own mind, by holding on to dreams of getting back.

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: Napoleon Dynamite is a socially awkward teenager who lives with his grandma and unemployed older brother in Preston, Idaho. He sets out to help his friend, Pedro, win the class presidency while dealing with his insane family at home.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: A step-father finds himself threatened by fierce competition when his step-children's father, who is way more cool than him, shows up suddenly.

programme.title: Henry's Crime
programme.desc: An innocent highway tollbooth worker is convicted of a bank heist, and decides to take the fall for a crime he did not do. While in jail, his formerly pathless life is altered when he meets his cellmate Max, a con man with whom he plans to rob a bank upon his release.

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Shy student Todd Anderson attends the school where his older brother was famous along with his roommate Neil Perry. They meet John Keating, the new English teacher who creates a club called The Dead Poets Society,through which he tries to help his students restore balance in their lives.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: An MIT professor discovers the mathematical genius of the school's janitor who is being sued for assaulting a police officer. He arranges for the janitor, Will, to forgo jail time if he agrees to undergo therapy and study mathematics under his tutelage.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Starting from a poor LA neighborhood, four friends find solace in their music as they use it to work through the various injustices they face day in and day out. As their brash lyrics attract controversy, their melodies and their authenticity soon transform the hip hop scene.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
programme.desc: After his mother was killed (Curtis '50 Cent' Jackson) was forced to leave school . He meets Majestic, and works with him in the drug business, but he later goes to jail. After leaving prison, he decides to mend his life and pursue his childhood dream of becoming a famous rapper.

programme.title: Mr. Wonderful
programme.desc: The electrician Gus dreams of having his own bowling-alley, but he can't pay the down payment because of the alimony payments he makes to his ex-wife Leonora. He decides to find potential suitors for her, so that she can get married and he stops paying alimony.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: Ferris pretends to be sick so he doesn't go to school, and he persuades his girlfriend Sloane and his friend Cameron to go to Chicago to spend time there to help him heal. The triple go with the car of Cameron's father, and events take a comic turn.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven

programme.desc: The film follows the huge success painter Margaret Keane had in the 1950s, and her heated divorce from her husband Walter Keane, who fraudulently claimed credit for her works.

programme.title: Crypto
programme.desc: Following a demotion, a Wall Street banker manages to find clues that unravel a global conspiracy. As he dives into the layers of corruption taking over New York, he soon finds his career, his life, and his family in peril.

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: Inspired by his ex-wife's memoirs, events revolve around the stunning story of the life and achievements of the inspiring physicist Stephen Hawking, despite his motor neurone disease, with a special focus on his relationship with his ex-wife, Jane Wilde.

programme.title: Tower Heist
programme.desc: A group of men who work at a tower discover that they are victims of a wealthy businessman, and that they are part of a plan to steal the tower.

programme.title: The Flood
programme.desc: An immigration officer finds herself in a tight spot as the fate of an asylum seeker lies in her hand, while flashbacks of his journey out of his homeland are portrayed.

programme.title: How To Lose A Guy In 10 Days
programme.desc: Journalist Andie Anderson specializes in writing topics of interest to women, but she wants to write about other things. She makes a deal with her boss that she would be free to write what she wants if she can write an article about what girls do wrong to spoil their relationship with guys.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: A barbershop in Chicago is a place where plenty of interesting situations happen between the customers and the hairdressers at the barbershop, where each have their own dreams that they strive to reach in many different ways.

programme.desc: When a case turns personal for a defense attorney, he has to do everything in his power to save the only son of his widowed friend, Mike, who is accused of killing his rich father. But the trial reveals a lot of dark and hidden secrets about the victim, his wife, and their familial relationships.

programme.desc: When she returns to her hometown for a business opportunity that involves a complicated confrontation with a childhood friend, Megan gets more than she reckoned for when her father breaks his leg and she starts helping at his cafe. Then an old flame shows up and everything spins out of control.

programme.title: Love Locks
programme.desc: In the City of Light, Lindsey fell in love with Jack while studying at the Sorbonne, a romance that quickly ended when she went back to the US. Twenty years later, Lindsey returns to Paris with her daughter, only to run into Jack who quickly catches feelings for her all over again.

programme.title: Fit for a Prince
programme.desc: After being hired by an opulent family to design the ladies' attire for a forthcoming charity event that the family is organizing, Cindy ends up meeting a prince who falls for her.

programme.title: Archive
programme.desc: After the tragic death of his wife, the scientist George Almore lives in an isolated facility as he tries to perfect a prototype of a true human-equivalent AI. But he keeps his real motive hidden, which is to bring his dead wife back to life.

programme.title: Fit for a Prince
programme.desc: After being hired by an opulent family to design the ladies' attire for a forthcoming charity event that the family is organizing, Cindy ends up meeting a prince who falls for her.

programme.title: In the Key of Love
programme.desc: After walking away from her former life to take over her grandmother's wedding photography business, the past comes calling for Maggie when she is hired for the wedding of her ex-boyfriend's sister. It turns out that there is still a spark between the two, just waiting to be reignited.

programme.title: Black Widow
programme.desc: Set after the Avengers' Civil War but before the war with Thanos, Natasha Romanoff goes on a new mission in Russia, which stirs up her past with the KGB, her training by the Red Room, and her journey to becoming the hero known as the Black Widow.

programme.title: The Bee Gees: How Can You Mend A Broken Heart
Paper Spiders
programme.desc: In the wake of losing her husband, Dawn experiences growing anxiety after she learns that her daughter, Melanie, is moving away for college, after which Melanie attempts to help her mother with her paranoid delusions that threaten to jeopardize their loving bond.

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: The adventures of Han Solo and Chewbacca before joining the Rebellion and their encounters with the famous gambler Lando Calrissian, in a journey that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga's most unlikely heroes.

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: After a confrontation on the road, a single mother and her son find themselves stalked by a deranged man who's hellbent on teaching them fatal lessons.

programme.title: The Lodge
programme.desc: When Richard takes his children to his fiancée Grace's lodge, he hopes that the time together will help the three bond as he is forced to leave for work. But their experience takes a terrifying turn when Grace's troubled past comes back to haunt her.

programme.title: Extra Ordinary
programme.desc: Rose still has a long way to accept the supernatural talents that she was gifted with. But fate thrusts her into a situation where she has to overcome her struggle in order to save a local teen, who is being used as a pawn in a Satanic deal to restore the fame of a has-been musician.

programme.title: Archive
programme.desc: After the tragic death of his wife, the scientist George Almore lives in an isolated facility as he tries to perfect a prototype of a true human-equivalent AI. But he keeps his real motive hidden, which is to bring his dead wife back to life.

programme.title: Paper Spiders
programme.desc: In the wake of losing her husband, Dawn experiences growing anxiety after she learns that her daughter, Melanie, is moving away for college, after which Melanie attempts to help her mother with her paranoid delusions that threaten to jeopardize their loving bond.

programme.title: Love in Design
programme.desc: With the ratings for her home renovation TV show in decline, Hannah is robbed into returning to her hometown to take on a new job that will take her show in a new direction: restoring a historical manor. Assigned to oversee her work is architect Jeff, who just happens to be her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Love, of Course
programme.desc: While helping her daughter move into her new dorm, Amy starts her own new chapter of life when she lands a job on campus. One charismatic professor later, Amy finds a new purpose and a fresh start that she never saw coming.

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: The adventures of Han Solo and Chewbacca before joining the Rebellion and their encounters with the famous gambler Lando Calrissian, in a journey that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga's most unlikely heroes.

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: When he learns that his old sweetheart, Lillian, has been diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease and taken to a senior center, the ageing, lovesick widower Claude hatches a plan to be reunited with her.

programme.title: Sitting in Limbo
programme.desc: After he is wretched living in the UK for 50 years, the Jamaican-born man, Anthony Bryan, struggles during the Windrush scandal to be accepted as a British Citizen, as well as falling victim to the UK Home Office, at which he is considered an illegal immigrant and is threatened of deportation.

programme.title: The Lost Husband
programme.desc: After her husband dies, Libby is forced to move in with her kids to her aunt's farm in Texas, where she struggles to adapt to a new life and get over her pain.

programme.title: The Comeback Trail
programme.desc: Two cash-strapped movie producers who owe money to the mob draw a scheme to bring back an aging movie star for an insurance scam in order to use his insurance policy to pay off their own debts, but they get more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: A boxer travels with his brother, who is managing him, for a final boxing match. But when an unexpected travel companion joins them, truths and cracks in the two brothers' relationship come to the surface.

programme.title: Galveston
programme.desc: As he barely escapes a fatal set up by his mobster boss, hitman Ryan finds himself accompanied by Rocky, a young prostitute that he saves, as he tries to find his way back to his hometown to recuperate and plan his revenge.(n)

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: After the mysterious brutal death of her colleague during a routine traffic stop, Officer Renee tries to understand the supernatural secret behind everything that's happening, and the danger that haunts her everywhere.(n)

programme.title: American Utopia
programme.desc: A live recording of rock musician David Byrne's Broadway show, American Utopia, which is based on his album of the same name, featuring a number of accompanying singers and musicians.(n)

programme.title: Secrets in the Woods
programme.desc: While on a romantic trip with her boyfriend in the woods, Sandra uncovers a dark secret about his father.(n)

programme.title: Secrets in the Basement
programme.desc: A blissful couple, Delilah and Shawn, moves to a new house in the suburbs, unaware of the fact that the house's basement is the dwelling of a sinister masked figure.(n)

programme.title: Love in Winterland
programme.desc: As Ally competes on a dating show, she returns to her hometown of Winterland, where she has to face her high school sweetheart, while dealing with the charming bachelor from the show.(n)

programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.(n)

programme.title: Sins and Seduction
programme.desc: After she welcomes a young couple into her church, the pastor Leslie Reynolds finds herself embroiled in a deadly game as the handsome man Gareth becomes dangerously obsessed with her.

programme.title: What to Expect When You're Expecting
programme.desc: The lives of five couples as they deal with the changes that come with impending parenthood, through the story of Alex who joins a support group after his wife surprises him with her desire to adopt a child.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle Of Life
programme.desc: The British Intelligence recruits archaeologist Lara Croft on a mission to get to Pandora's box, which has the most dangerous disease known to mankind. Evil scientist Jonathan has his sights set on the box as well, and Lara Croft agrees to face him on the condition that the Intelligence release the man she is in a relationship with.

programme.title: Picture Perfect Mysteries: Newlywed and Dead
programme.desc: During a wedding, the groom is mysteriously shot dead. The wedding photographer, Allie, finds herself smack dab in the middle of a murder investigation as she tries to prove the innocence of her brother, who just happens to be the bride's ex.

programme.title: All Yours
programme.desc: When she is in need of someone to take care of her children, the widowed attorney Casey finds her man in Matt, a family friend that she hires as a nanny. With Matt added to the mix, Casey finds her family life completely changed and sparks start to fly between her and Matt.

programme.title: What to Expect When You're Expecting
programme.desc: The lives of five couples as they deal with the changes that come with impending parenthood, through the story of Alex who joins a support group after his wife surprises him with her desire to adopt a child.

programme.title: The Children Act
programme.desc: A renowned High Court Judge deals with a personal crisis just as she has to rule on one of the hardest cases of her life. Her ruling is what determines whether an underage leukemia patient can refuse a life-saving blood transfusion for religious reasons or not.

programme.title: Dead Over Diamonds: Picture Perfect Mysteries
programme.desc: When a diamond necklace is stolen, Det. Sam enlists the help of the photographer Allie to find it. The last thing they expect during their investigation is for it to point them straight to an unexpected death.

programme.title: Date with Love
programme.desc: In a bid to raise his popularity at school, David makes a video asking an actress, Alex Allen, to be his date to prom, which soon goes viral. Desperate for some good publicity, Alex accepts the proposal, only to end up falling for David's teacher.

programme.title: Mystic pizza
programme.desc: Jojo, Daisy and Kat are three teenage girls, who just graduated from high school and working at a pizza parlor. Each with a different ambition, trying to reach their goals. In that summer before college, they learn more about life, love, goals and about themselves.

programme.title: Gia
programme.desc: The true story of the top fashion model, Gia Carangi, who rose to the top of the modeling world from the late 1970s.

programme.title: Like a Boss

programme.desc: Wendy is a brilliant young woman with autism living in a group home in the care of Scottie who helps her to control her anger fits. Her sister, Audrey, visits her but refuses Wendy’s request to take her home, fearing for her baby, Ruby. Determined to prove her worth, Wendy sets out on an adventure to complete and deliver her 469-page Start Trek script to Paramount Pictures, competing for $100,000.(n)

programme.title: Hot Air
programme.desc: The life of a conservative radio host turns upside down when his previously-unknown 16-year-old niece shows up suddenly on his doorstep, bringing with her an unexpected bond and a fierce challenge to everything he ever fought for.(n)
